wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[1 January|1]]''' - ''[[A Tolkien Miscellany]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 43]] is published.
==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - Fan site [http://www.councilofelrond.com/ Council of Elrond] goes online. 
* '''[[24 March|24]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' wins four Oscars, out of thirteen nominations, at the [[wikipedia:74th Academy Awards|74th Academy Awards]].
==May==
* '''[[29 May|29]]''' - The mailing list ''[[Lambengolmor (mailing list)|Lambengolmor]]'' is launched.
==June==
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - At the [[wikipedia:2002 MTV Movie Awards|MTV Movie Awards]], ''[[Lord of the Piercing]]'' is aired. 
* '''[[12 June|12]]''' - ''[[The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' is published.
* '''[[18 June|18]]''' - ''[[The Standard Deviants: Rings, Kings and Things]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 44]] is published.
==July==
* '''[[12 July|12]]''' - [[Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]], scholar and friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - Actor [[Alexander John]] dies.
* '''[[25 July|25]]''' - ''[[The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[26 July|26]]-[[29 July|29]]''' - [[Mythcon 33]].

==August==
* '''[[5 August|5]] - ''[[The History of Middle-earth Index]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[8 August|8]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing IV]].
* '''[[16 August|16]]''' - ''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[13 September|13]]-[[15 September|15]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2002]].
* '''[[24 September|24]]''' - The Xbox and GBA ports of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]] are published in the US.
* '''[[26 September|26]]''' - [[I.L. Gordon]] dies.

==October==
* '''[[5 October|5]]''' - The [[Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin]] is founded.
* '''[[16 October|16]]''' - The PS2 port of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]] is published in the US. 
* '''[[22 October|22]]''' - The PC port of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]] is published in the US. 
==November==
* '''[[2 November|2]]''' - The symposium "J.R.R. Tolkien: The Man Behind The Lord of the Rings" is held at the [http://acmrs.org/ Arizona Center for Medieval and Renaissance Studies]. [[Tom Shippey]], [[Randel Helms]] and Ron Newcomer speak.
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Making of the Movie Trilogy]]'' is published.
* '''[[12 November|12]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' Extended Edition]] is released on DVD. 
* '''[[13 November|13]]''' - The ''South Park'' episode "[[The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers]]" is televised.
* '''[[29 November|29]]''' -  [[John Justin]], who played [[Thorin]] in [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]], dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Sanctifying Myth|J.R.R. Tolkien's Sanctifying Myth: Understanding Middle-earth]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[5 December|5]]''' - '''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''' premieres at Ziegfeld Theatre, in New York City.
* '''[[6 December|6]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Photo Guide]]'' is published.
* '''[[10 December|10]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' is released.
* '''[[18 December|18]]''' - '''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''' is released in USA.
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - '''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''' is released in New Zealand.
* '''?''' - [[Dragon Flame]] is released.

==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[At Dawn in Rivendell]]'', the third album of the [[Tolkien Ensemble]], is published.
* '''?''' - The [[audiobooks|audiobook]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', read by [[Rob Inglis]], is published.
{{Years|1999|2000|2001|2002|2003|2004|2005|}}
